text: In 1862, Mankato, Minnesota, was the site of the largest mass execution in U.S. history. 38 Dakota Indians were hanged at the order of Abraham Lincoln. name: nytimes
text: Pope Francis describes ethnic Uighurs in western China as a “persecuted” people in an upcoming book, a move that could tarnish the Vatican’s relations with Beijing. China has long denied abuses of Uighurs, despite widespread evidence of a brutal crackdown. https://t.co/dMRP8e0mdJ
